While assembling my space stations and crewing them I found that I have the tendency to spend far to much time with crew transfers and stuff because the largest stock command capsule has a crew of 3 and the Dragon mod has 7 but only (in my opinion) looks good with the rest of the Dragon components. So I decided I'd start working on a 3m command capsule with a crew of about 7-8, maybe more with working lights inside and outside for docking purposes, small amounts of electricity and monopropellant. with more sides, as you sort of requested.
Retro Rockets for soft landings (yes it is just simply a flat disc thing )

Adding a lip with more outward facing sides at the end of a cylinder covers the edges and obscures the number of sides, so with proper texture work it's less obvious that it's low poly, the stock fuel tanks do this. The texture obscures the faces and the lip obscures the edges so you can't just look at it and quickly say how many faces there are, allowing them to have fewer polys and look just as good.
